bibl.title: Letter from Laura Wood to Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]

div1.p: Wood provides Wormley's address and informs Hench that Howard is still alive.

div1.head: Letter from Laura Wood to Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]
div1.p:
That dr we
were talking about is Dr. Lowell C.
Normley, 1155 Prospect Ave, N Y C.
(that's the Bronx.) Phone is Day ton 9-
7744. I looked him up in the N Y
phone book. His the only da Normley
in it, & that was the first name,
all right. So I guess you steal a
march on Dr. Malloch. I am cur-
ious to know if you found the book
Mrs. W. Crosby Roper, Jr.
Ac
NP
catalogued in the S. M's library. It
certainly isn't under “Reed” anyway.

Mrs Hench will have told you. I suppose
that Dr P. O Howard is still in circula-
tion, in case you want to see him.

Id was so nice to see you both.
If you find you have any space there
before you go, I should be so pleased if
you would let me know so we could
gossip some more about our-shall I say,
lefty?
